PDesc: The Aperol Spritz is one of the most popular aperitif cocktails in Italy. Just Aperol, prosecco and club soda, it's as easy to make as it is to drink.
PHtm:
Add lime wedgesugar to the old fashioned glass
Crush lime wedgesugar with muddler
Fill up the glass with crushed ice
Pour cachaca into the glass
Stir together
Garnish with lime wedge
